issue.summary: NOVEL patch created to capture sequence from AC020766.10 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.description: NOVEL patch GL383556.1 created to capture sequence from AC020766.10 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.resolution_text: NOVEL patch GL383556.1 created to capture ~12 kb of sequence from AC020766.10 not represented in reference chromosome

issue.summary: NOVEL patch created to capture sequence from AC208009.3 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.description: NOVEL patch GL383557.1 created to capture sequence from AC208009.3 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.resolution_text: NOVEL patch GL383557.1 created to capture 5141bp sequence from AC208009.3 not represented in reference chromosome

issue.summary: GeneID: 58531 (PRM3), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: NM_021247.1 encodes a 103 amino acid protein that is supported by orthologs. However the reference genome codes for a sense codon 'CGA', where the expected stop codon is 'TGA'.
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF459690.1 addresses rs438289 and has been added to the reference tile path for GRCh38

issue.summary: GeneID: 388282 (LOC388282), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: AC092118.3 contains an 8 nucleotide deletion (AGGTGGGC) compared to the HuRef alternate assemblies, AC_000148.1, HTGS BACs AC009128.7 and AC092285.1. The 8 nts are present in orangutan, macaque and baboon. The 8 nt deletion affects a potential 173-aa ORF, although it's only conserved in chimp so it's not clear if the gene is coding or non-coding.
issue.resolution_text: PCR_RP11_AC092118_1 (FO082293.1) was created and successfully confirmed that 8 bases were missing from this region.

issue.summary: potential sequencing error in clone AC099489 disrupts CDS of putative gene
issue.description: A potential sequencing error in clone AC099489 causes a frameshift within the CDS of putative gene
issue.resolution_text: KF573656.1 fixes the indel within AC099489.

issue.summary: Chr. 16 CHORI-17 Pathway
issue.description: Several clones have been selected for sequencing that align near the AC092291.3 - AC098965.2 region of Chr. 16. These may be used to improve the reference or to represent an alternate haplotype.
issue.resolution_text: This CHORI-17 path represents an inversion haplotype relative to GRCh37 Chromosome NC_000016.9 and has been added as an alt_loci.

issue.summary: Chr. 16 CHORI-17 Pathway
issue.description: Several clones have been selected for sequencing that align near the AC020763.6 - AC106736.4 region of Chr. 16. These may be used to improve the reference or to represent an alternate haplotype.
issue.resolution_text: This CH17 pathway does not meet the criteria to replace the reference or for alt_loci creation.

issue.summary: There is a gap in the chromosome between components AC109490.3 and AC106819.3
issue.status_text: 11-JUN-09: CH17-251E23 is in active finishing Accession for CH17-251E23: FP325338 20-JAN-14: RP11-790L17 has been cancelled
issue.description: The assembly is missing euchromatic sequence on the q-arm side of the centromere adjacent to AC106819.3, so will be extended until we find evidence of heterochromatic or centromeric repeats.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Issue reported from Web Site: Possible path problem
issue.status_text: The tiling path in this region of GRCh37 has been assessed. Comparison to OMs suggests that sequence may be missing. There may be a tiling path error or variation involving a CNV segmental duplication (or both). For GRCh38, we added a chr. 16 unlocalized scaffold (KI270728.1/NT_187383.1) that contains RP11 clones that represent sequence not represented on the chromosome. We will continue to investigate this region in order to resolve the sequence ambiguities.
issue.description: Possible haplotype issue causing path problem at 16p11.2
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Sequence from scaffold5537_294215_311518.1:1-10457 needs to be represented in GRCh38
issue.description: scaffold5537_294215_311518.1:1-10457 has been confirmed as human sequence and should be represented in GRCh38
issue.resolution_text: Sequence from scaffold5537_294215_311518.1:1-10457 is now represented in the reference tile path

issue.summary: GeneID: 55911 (APOB48R), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is an "intron" between nt 1090 and 1091 of NM_018690.1 based on the reference genome. However, it is not bordered by consensus splice junctions, and this "intron" is not found in HTGS sequences, including AC145284.1
issue.resolution_text: Review by annotators indicates the discrepancy was caused by alignment issues in the vicinity of a CNV tandem repeat. The reference genome looks correct and the RefSeq has been update to match the genome (NM_018690.3)

issue.summary: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC129779.2 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.description: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC129779.2 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.resolution_text: This decoy has been captured and can be found in GRCh38 reference component AC129779.2

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC003965.1
issue.description: Analysis of GU267688.1 and GU268947.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 16, suggest there may be ~5,327 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC003965.1. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: AC217628.3 has been added to the chromosome as a novel patch which represents an ~6kb insertion variant relative to Chr16 component AC003965.1.

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC018768.7
issue.status_text: RP11 Whole Genome Shotgun indicates this is variation
issue.description: Analysis of GU268427.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 16, suggest there may be ~3,472 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC018768.7. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC012645.7
issue.status_text: Based on RP11 Whole Genome Shotgun, optical map data and sequence across the region this is variation not a clone misassembly
issue.description: Analysis of GU267121.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 16, suggest there may be ~1,891 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC012645.7. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC106736.4
issue.description: Analysis of GU268847.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 16, suggest there may be ~4,784 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC106736.4. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: AC009136.6 has been added to the chromosome as a novel patch which represents a 5kb insertion variant relative to Chr16 component AC106736.4.

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC092379.4
issue.description: Analysis of GU268203.1, GU268988.1 and GU267195.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 16, suggest there may be ~7,782 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC092379.4. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: This variation will be represented in an alternate tile path with AC203638.2 representing a sequence variant containing ~7.782bp that does not align to GRCh38 NC_000016.10 component AC092379.4

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC106745.4
issue.status_text: This variation is not present in RP11 based on Whole genome shotgun reads and RP11 clone AC140908 which matches sequence clone AC106745
issue.description: Analysis of GU267931.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 16, suggest there may be ~1,953 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC106745.4. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

ABBA01006947.1 also has part of this missing sequence.
issue.description: 250bp of sequence may be missing from AC009152.8 at the 5'end of gene XYLT1 located on human chromosome 16

issue.status_text: Whole genome shotgun assemblies either match the reference genome or have no coverage in the region, only the 1000 genomes data shows evidence of this indel.

issue.summary: GeneID: 283897 (C16orf54), may be redundant
issue.description: Unplaced contig NT_113929 (component: AC002301.1) has an alignment to sequence present in reference chr. 16
issue.resolution_text: AC002301.1 has been verified as redundant and removed from the assembly.

issue.summary: End sequence alignments collapse in this region.
issue.description: End sequence mapping suggests missing sequence in the reference assembly.
issue.resolution_text: The new accession for clone RP11-696P19 FP885539 overlaps well with adjacent clone AC092368. The end sequence alignments within the clone seem concordant and the size of the clone is correct based on it's expected size relative to it's digest

issue.summary: GeneID: 8131 (NPRL3), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_001077350.1 (NPRL3) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF459691.1 has been added to the chromosome 16 GRCh38 TPF to address the deletion.

issue.summary: GeneID: 85445 (CNTNAP4), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_033401.3 (CNTNAP4) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: PCR has been sequenced and confirms a 1-nt deletion in the component AC010528 between 112336/7 of the EMBL submission. The PCR shows an insertion of an A and agrees with the transcript NM_033401.3.

issue.summary: GeneID: 90850 (ZNF598), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.status_text: The 2 1-nt potential insertions in the reference will be assessed to check if there is a problem with the current representation of sequence
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_178167.2 (ZNF598) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: GeneID: 114780 (PKD1L2), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.status_text: The Genome is carrying the common, but non-coding allele. Mini-contig KF459692.2 was added to the assembly for GRCh38 to update rs117006360 (NC_000016.10:81,141,373; A->G), eliminating a stop codon at nt 5341 of RefSeq NM_052892.3. However an indel at NC_000016.10: 81,127,878/9 (RefSeq NM_052892.3 nt 6232) still introduces a frameshift and premature termination. The reference base has been confirmed correct by genomic PCR. We continue look for genomic sequence containing the insertion and its MAF.
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_052892.3 (PKD1L2) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: GeneID: 197358 (NLRC3), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_178844.2 (NLRC3) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: FO082291.1(PCR_RP11_AC006111_1) has been added to the TPF as a contained clone within AC006111 to correct the base error

issue.summary: Chr.16 Component Gap Problem
issue.description: Sequence is missing from within component Z84812.1.
issue.resolution_text: Ticket incorrectly generated due to out of date spreadsheet. Ticket closed.

issue.summary: Chr.16 Gap Problem
issue.status_text: further investigation to locate sequence that covers the chromosome gaps is required
issue.description:
There is a gap in the assembly between components AC136932 and AC135776. AC129779.2 was added extending from AC135776 and for GRCh38 ABBA01017803.1 was added extending into the gap from AC136932.4. Additional sequence was added to this gap see below for details,
The GRCh38 path in this gap is,
AC136392 ABBA01017803 GAP TYPE-3 FP325313 FO681535 GAP TYPE-3 ABBA01002124 GAP TYPE-2 ABBA01002123 GAP TYPE-2 ABBA01002122 AC129779 AC135776
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: There is a gap in the chromosome between components AC109490.3 and AC106819.3
issue.status_text: Further data will be analysed to locate sequence that covers this missing region
issue.description:
There is a gap in the assembly between components AC109490.3 and AC106819.3. AC109490 does not contain centromeric repeats, which means that the assembly is missing euchromatic sequence on the p-arm side of the centromere, so will be extended from AC109490 until we find evidence of centromeric repeats.
FP325312.10 and AUXG01000322.1 extend into the gap from AC109490. Additionally AUXG01000323.1 has been added in this gap adjacent to AUXG01000322.1 but does not overlap it.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Chr.16 Gap Problem
issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between components AC109490.3 and AC106819.3.
issue.resolution_text: This issue is a duplicate of issue HG-519. Please see Jira issue HG-519 for all future updates regarding this issue.

issue.status_text: The gap will be assessed to look for new clones that cover the missing sequence here

issue.summary: GeneID: 8399 (PLA2G10), may be redundant
issue.description: Possible duplication near join between AC009167.9 and AC136443.3
issue.resolution_text: The optical map GM18994 agrees with the reference, However the optical maps GM10860 and GM15510 show an inversion. This would indicate that there is variation occurring here, so no change is required

issue.summary: Chr. 16 Gap Problem Region #1
issue.status_text: Awaiting confirmation that external PCR product GQ267544 is suitable for use in the reference assembly.
issue.description: Optical map data suggests genomic gap is smaller than reported gap size between AC140531.3 and AC138420.2
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Chr.16 Gap Problem
issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly in component Z84812.1
issue.resolution_text: Ticket created in error. No problem in this region. Component Z84812 sequences in to the telomere.

issue.summary: GeneID: 342372 (PKD1L3), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: AC009127.10 has a 4nt deletion compared to the transcript NM_181536.1 resulting in a frame shift in the CDS
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF459693.1 addresses rs149635567 and has been added to the TPF for GRCh38.

issue.summary: GeneID: 283953 (TMEM114), assembly gap, chromosome
issue.description: The first two exons of NM_001146336.1 (nt 1..302) do not align to the reference assembly (build 36 or 37) because of a gap between AC140531.3 and AC138420.2
issue.resolution_text: This is a duplicate of issue HG-65. Please see Jira issue HG-65 for all future updates regarding this issue.

issue.summary: GeneID: 64499 (TPSB2), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.status_text: waiting on SAB decision regarding minor allele representation
issue.description: NM_024164.5 contains a 1 nt deletion at nt 475 compared to the AC120498.2 component. Adjusting this to match the genomic sequence causes problems resulting in a shorter protein product than normal.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Misassembly haplotype in 16p12
issue.description: The sequence for this region of the genome represents a mis-assembly. New tiling paths are being generated to represent the valid haplotypes in this region.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: GeneID: 23117 (NPIPL3), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.status_text: Sequencing has completed for RP11-343H14 accession FO681543. This new accession still has 2 base differences compared to AK294452.1 but fixes the exon gap issue. Further investigation will be carried out to determine if this is a worthwhile addition to the reference chromosome.
issue.description: AK294452.1 aligns to at least 5 loci on NT_010393.16, the best of which is GeneID:23117. AK294452.1:282..3163 should be a single exon, but aligns with a gap and several indels vs. AC008740.7. It has a perfect match to draft BAC AC069176.4, and nearly perfect to AC138881.2. The suspect exon is a tandem repeat, and the repeat region represented in AC008740.7 results in a frameshift and truncated CDS. Is AC008740.7 rearranged, or does AC069176.4 represent a gene missing from GRCh37?
issue.resolution_text: na
